nodes.text: This  unidentified planet was the site of a battle between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars.
This planet featured mountains and appeared to be purple from orbit.

During the Clone Wars, Republic forces were present on this planet. Sometime between the battle of Bal'demnic and the invasion of Orto, the Separatists attacked the planet with a fleet of Providence-class carrier/destroyers. The Separatists then invaded the planet with B2 super battle droids and OG-9 homing spider droids. The battle ended when countless droids surrounded just a handful of clone troopers, forcing them to surrender.
This planet first appeared in the twenty-second episode of the animated television series Star Wars: Clone Wars, which originally aired on Cartoon Network on March 22, 2005.
